## IDragStrategy.startDrag() method

Handles any drag startup (e.g moving elements to the front of the workspace).

**Signature:**

```typescript
startDrag(e?: PointerEvent): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

e


</td><td>

PointerEvent


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ PointerEvent that started the drag; can be used to check modifier keys, etc. May be missing when dragging is triggered programatically rather than by user.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void
